definition: an occasion on which people can assemble for social interaction and entertainment, have or participate in a party
details:
noun
- an occasion on which people can assemble for social interaction and entertainment
= example: an occasion on which people can assemble for social interaction and entertainment
- a group of people gathered together for pleasure
= example: a group of people gathered together for pleasure
- an organization to gain political power
= example: an organization to gain political power
= synonyms: political party
- a band of people associated temporarily in some activity
= example: a band of people associated temporarily in some activity
= synonyms: company
- a person involved in legal proceedings
= example: a person involved in legal proceedings
verb
- have or participate in a party
= example: have or participate in a party
